products_data.title: Cookie Pie Coat
products_data.description: You hurry up the path of your best friend's house with a fresh, home-baked treat nestled in the crook of your arm. Cloaked in this nubbly, chocolate-speckled taupe coat, you're as toasty warm as the ooey-gooey pie you baked for a giggle-filled girls' night in. Greeting you at the door, your pal raves about your delectable hooded coat - its double-breasted, silver-lined licorice buttons mixing perfectly with your black leggings, tunic-length shirtdress, patterned socks, and lace-up boots. In this charming confection, you're sure to look sweet!
products_data.productType: Taxonomy=Apparel > Outerwear > Coat > Fit & Flare Coat, Variation=None, Primary Color=Brown, Secondary Color=None, Fabric=None, Fabric Composition=Wool, Pattern=Solid, Embellishment=Belted, Occasion=Work, Silhouette=Fit & Flare Coat, Sleeve=None, Neckline=None, Length=None, Material=Wool

products_data.title: Magicicada Earrings
products_data.description: Harken the hum of late summer evenings each time you add these cicada earrings by Erica Weiner to your get-up. Bold and edgy in their striking detail, this gold pair perfectly mimics the magnificent presence of the insects themselves, effortlessly infusing your ensemble with a statement! Self-taught and NYC-based, Erica Weiner crafts jewelry with recycled gems, a rich historical context, and the help of a close friend.
products_data.productType: Taxonomy=Accessory > Jewelry > Earring > Earring, Variation=None, Primary Color=Gold, Secondary Color=None, Fabric=None, Fabric Composition=Metal, Pattern=Matte, Embellishment=None, Occasion=Daytime Party, Silhouette=None, Sleeve=None, Neckline=None, Length=None, Material=Metal

products_data.title: Reading Room Romance Oxford Flat
products_data.description: Peering over the edge of your novel, you spy your crush from across the reading room. Clad in these chestnut flats by Restricted, you confidently wave hello, realizing then that the tome you each hold is the same. With navy fabric panels and a leather lining, these classic lace-ups add a secondary storyline to the romance that's soon to unfold!
products_data.productType: Taxonomy=Shoe > Flat > Oxford Flat > Oxford Flat, Variation=None, Primary Color=Brown, Secondary Color=Navy, Fabric=None, Fabric Composition=Pu, Pattern=Colorblock, Embellishment=None, Occasion=Work, Silhouette=Flat - 0-1, Sleeve=None, Neckline=None, Length=None, Material=Pu

products_data.title: Charter School Cardigan
products_data.description: Show your style smarts in this burgundy cardigan! With a buttoned front, 3/4-length sleeves, and a fine, soft knit with ribbed edges, this burgundy sweater will be your favorite wardrobe staple. No matter how you wear it, this ModCloth-exclusive piece - with improved fabric to avoid pilling - offers an A+ look.
products_data.productType: Taxonomy=Apparel > Top > Sweater > Cardigan, Variation=None, Primary Color=Red, Secondary Color=Burgundy, Fabric=None, Fabric Composition=Light Weight, Pattern=Solid, Embellishment=None, Occasion=Work, Silhouette=Cardigan, Sleeve=3/4 Sleeve, Neckline=Vneck, Length=Waist, Material=Light Weight

products_data.title: Aong y Swan A-Line Skirt
products_data.description: Fill your day with sheer delight when you're clad in this pink A-line skirt by Emily and Fin. We adore this midi's lightweight, woven construction, handy side pockets, and beautiful swan motif.
products_data.productType: Taxonomy=Apparel > Bottom > Skirt > A-line Skirt, Variation=None, Primary Color=Pink, Secondary Color=Black, Fabric=None, Fabric Composition=Poly, Pattern=Novelty, Embellishment=None, Occasion=Casual, Silhouette=A-line Skirt, Sleeve=None, Neckline=None, Length=Knee Length, Material=Poly

products_data.title: Watch Me Bloom Peplum Top
products_data.description: Flaunting a fresh look is easy with this peplum top by Royal Monk-formerly Banned. With yellow florals, short fluttery sleeves, and an adjustable tie at the deep V-neckline, this beauty is a total wardrobe keeper!

products_data.title: Just This Sway A-Line Skirt
products_data.description: You'll definitely have that swing when you step out in this solid red midi skirt! Part of our ModCloth namesake label, this elasticized-back circle skirt touts a vintage-inspired, high-waisted design with handy hidden pockets and beautifully-draped fabric, sure to influence a plethora of dance-worthy ensembles.

products_data.title: On the Write Track T-Shirt
products_data.description: Whether you're an aspiring novelist, an avid journaler, or simply a fan of prose, you can appreciate the screenprinted vintage typewriter on this olive-green tee! Wear black denim and an ivory cardi alongside this shirt's soft, cotton-blend knit, scoop neckline, and heathered hue. This basic top is key to creating the 'write' look!
products_data.productType: Taxonomy=Apparel > Top > Graphic Tee > Short Sleeve Graphic, Variation=None, Primary Color=Green, Secondary Color=Olive, Fabric=None, Fabric Composition=Jersey, Pattern=Solid, Embellishment=None, Occasion=Casual, Silhouette=Fitted, Sleeve=Short, Neckline=Scoop, Length=Waist, Material=Jersey

products_data.title: The Richmond Pant - Short Inseam
products_data.description: The fine arts museum, the botanical garden, the capitol - where will you sport these blue slacks first? A versatile offering from our ModCloth namesake label, this straight-leg pair offers a mid rise, pockets, sleek front seams, and a 27 inch inseam you'll want to flaunt to the office - and everywhere else the day takes you! This pair is equipped with Smart Pockets, a clever interior front panel developed to hug, smooth, and flatter your figure with true design intelligence.
products_data.productType: Taxonomy=Apparel > Bottom > Pant > Skinny Pant, Variation=None, Primary Color=Blue, Secondary Color=Navy, Fabric=Woven, Fabric Composition=None, Pattern=Solid, Embellishment=None, Occasion=Work, Silhouette=Skinny Pant, Sleeve=None, Neckline=None, Length=Ankle, Material=Woven

products_data.title: The Manhattan Pant
products_data.description: On days when you wear these navy trousers, it's hard to tell whether it's the city's buzz or your outfit that puts the pep in your step! With a high-waisted silhouette, these stretch-knit, ModCloth namesake label pants provide a go-to foundation for the impressive looks that propel you through midtown so poshly.
